items.title: Flipping Burgers - McDonald's To Restaurant Brands International
items.description: Restaurant Brands' (QSR) current lower valuation and higher growth potential make it an attractive buy. See here for a comparison with McDonald's (MCD).

items.title: Top Analyst Reports for Microsoft, Broadcom & McDonald's
